name: 终点论坛
introduction: Galgame资源搜索,可以搜索一些游戏资源

auth.logged: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('访问我的空间')!=-1){return true;}else{return false;};}

request: https://bbs.zdfx.net/search.php?mod=forum&searchid=999&orderby=lastpost&ascdesc=desc&searchsubmit=yes&kw=%E5%88%80%E5%89%91@charset->UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.111 Safari/537.36

search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'h3.xs3 > a');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'h3.xs3 > a@attr->href')+'@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36';}

url.url: function Main(html){var data = strmiddle(jsoup(html,'div.panel-body > a > button@attr->onclick'),'\'','\'')+'@header->Referer:https://www.kkgal.com/';var key = '';if(html.indexOf('提取密码')!=-1){key = '@js->javascript:document.querySelector("input[type=text]").value = "'+jsoup(html,'div.panel-footer > b:nth-child(1) > span > span')+'"';}return data+key;}
